languages.text: "Кощунственный сговор! Я отвергаю помощь мирян. Я — шестерня Деус Механикус, что мелет скверну, и я свершу экзекуцию немедленно!"
"A sacrilegious conspiracy! I refuse help from laypersons. I am a cog of the Deus Mechanicus that grinds down corruption, and I will carry out the sentence immediately!"
languages.original_text: "Кощунственный сговор! Я отвергаю помощь мирян. Я — шестерня Деус Механикус, что мелет скверну, и я свершу экзекуцию немедленно!"

traits.locale_text: "A sacrilegious conspiracy! I refuse help from laypeople. I am a cog of the Deus Mechanicus that grinds down corruption, and I will carry out the sentence immediately!"
traits.speaker: Tarzus

traits.locale_text: "A sacrilegious conspiracy! I refuse help from laypersons. I am a cog of the Deus Mechanicus that grinds down corruption, and I will carry out the sentence immediately!"
traits.speaker: Tarzus

languages.text: 「罰当たりな陰謀だ！俗人からの助けなど拒否する。私は腐敗を打ち砕くデウス・メカニクスの一員だ。刑を即刻執行する！」
languages.original_text: "A sacrilegious conspiracy! I refuse help from laypersons. I am a cog of the Deus Mechanicus that grinds down corruption, and I will carry out the sentence immediately!"

traits.locale_text: 「罰当たりな陰謀だ！俗人からの助けなど拒否する。私は腐敗を打ち砕くデウス・メカニクスの一員だ。刑を即刻執行する！」
traits.speaker: Tarzus

languages.text: “这是亵渎神明的阴谋！我拒绝接受外行人的协助！我是万机之神的齿轮，我将铲除一切腐化！我要立刻执行判决！”
languages.original_text: "A sacrilegious conspiracy! I refuse help from laypersons. I am a cog of the Deus Mechanicus that grinds down corruption, and I will carry out the sentence immediately!"

traits.locale_text: “这是亵渎神明的阴谋！我拒绝接受外行人的协助！我是万机之神的齿轮，我将铲除一切腐化！我要立刻执行判决！”
traits.speaker: Tarzus

languages.text: "Eine sakrilegische Verschwörung! Ich verweigere die Hilfe durch Laien. Ich bin ein Zahnrad des Deus Mechanicus, das Verderbnis bekämpft, und ich werde die Strafe umgehend vollstrecken!"
languages.original_text: "A sacrilegious conspiracy! I refuse help from laypersons. I am a cog of the Deus Mechanicus that grinds down corruption, and I will carry out the sentence immediately!"

traits.locale_text: "Eine sakrilegische Verschwörung! Ich verweigere die Hilfe durch Laien. Ich bin ein Zahnrad des Deus Mechanicus, das Verderbnis bekämpft, und ich werde die Strafe umgehend vollstrecken!"
traits.speaker: Tarzus

languages.text: « Une conspiration sacrilège ! Jamais je n'accepterai l'aide de profanes. Je suis un rouage du Deus Mechanicus qui broie la corruption sous toutes ses formes et je m'en vais exécuter la sentence immédiatement ! »
languages.original_text: "A sacrilegious conspiracy! I refuse help from laypersons. I am a cog of the Deus Mechanicus that grinds down corruption, and I will carry out the sentence immediately!"

traits.locale_text: « Une conspiration sacrilège ! Jamais je n'accepterai l'aide de profanes. Je suis un rouage du Deus Mechanicus qui broie la corruption sous toutes ses formes et je m'en vais exécuter la sentence immédiatement ! »
traits.speaker: Tarzus

languages.text: «¡Una conspiración sacrílega! Me niego a aceptar la ayuda de unos seglares. ¡Soy un engranaje del Deus Mechanicus que tritura la corrupción, y ejecutaré inmediatamente la sentencia!».
languages.original_text: "A sacrilegious conspiracy! I refuse help from laypersons. I am a cog of the Deus Mechanicus that grinds down corruption, and I will carry out the sentence immediately!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Una conspiración sacrílega! Me niego a aceptar la ayuda de unos seglares. ¡Soy un engranaje del Deus Mechanicus que tritura la corrupción, y ejecutaré inmediatamente la sentencia!».
traits.speaker: Tarzus

languages.text: "Hürmetsizce bir komplo! Avamın yardımını reddediyorum. Ben bir Deus Mechanicus dişlisiyim. Yozlaşmayı paramparça eder, anında hüküm veririm!"
languages.original_text: "A sacrilegious conspiracy! I refuse help from laypersons. I am a cog of the Deus Mechanicus that grinds down corruption, and I will carry out the sentence immediately!"

traits.locale_text: "Din dışı bir komplo! Avamın yardımını reddediyorum. Ben Deus Mechanicus'un bir dişlisiyim. Yozlaşmayı paramparça eder, hükmü anında veririm!"
traits.speaker: Tarzus
